title: Roger Stone Russian Network: From Lobbying to Intelligence Operations Timeline
description: Map the evolution of Roger Stone's relationships with Russian operatives from traditional lobbying activities to sophisticated intelligence operations, focusing on 2025 activities.
research_areas: What specific Russian contacts did Roger Stone maintain during 2025?
Which dates connect Stone's Russian network to Trump administration decisions?
How did Stone's intelligence gathering operations evolve in sophistication?
What financial transactions link Stone to Russian entities during 2025?
source_requirements: Financial records, communication intercepts, intelligence reports, congressional testimony
pdf_source: Roger Stone's Russian Influence Network_ From Lobbying to Intelligence Operations.pdf
